(:action read ; Read a resource and update status
 :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource)
 :precondition (and (at ?resource ?entity) (not (read ?resource)))
 :effect (read ?resource))

(:action wash ;  Wash an item of clothing and update its cleanliness status
  :parameters (?item - clothing ?p - person ?wm - washing_machine)
  :precondition (and (read ?ins) (at ?item ?p) (at ?wm ?p))
  :effect (clean ?item)
)

(:action check ; Check an item and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?checker - person)
  :precondition (and (available ?checker) (at ?entity ?checker) (not (checked ?entity)) (condition ?entity))
  :effect (and (checked ?entity))

(:action clean ; Clean an item and update its state
  :parameters (?person - person ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?item ?person) (not (clean ?item)))
  :effect (clean ?item)
)
